title: Brest
description: These decadent pastries filled with praline and cream are like giant profiteroles, perfect for sharing. For this recipe you will need: a food processor, a piping bag, a star nozzle and a silicone mat.
ingredients: 4 medium free-range eggs, 3 lightly beaten and 1 for egg wash
1 vanilla pod, sliced in half lengthways and seeds scraped out
